name: Real Golf Master 3D
description:
Experience the most authentic and exciting golf game available in app store. Real Golf Master 3D is the most realistic golfing game with amazing 3D golf courses and scenes.
Real Golf Master 3D is equipped with perfect golfing controls to give ultimate golfing experience. Feel the excitement of every golf hit with precise touch controls now. It is very easy to play. Show your master skills of golf to make a hole. Play all hole with real PAR scoring system.

Game Environments:
Real Golf Master 3D is loaded 2 best golfing environments/courses.
1. Pebble Beach
2. High Meadows.

Game Features:
Real Golf Master 3D is equipped with exciting golfing features, to give ultimate golfing experience to the user.
1. Best golf courses/environments
2. Realistic Touch Controls
3. Character Selection
4. Attractive Graphics
5. Realistic Golf Game Play with amazing 3D visual effects
6. Real Time Weather Selection.

Game Play:
- Enter your name
- Select your avatar/character
- Select Weather
- Select Golf Course
- Look at the pole and direct the ball in required direction, press the hit button to apply force on the ball, release to hit the ball. When select the required golf club or putter to pot the ball in hole.
- While playing be-aware of the water pounds and wind factor.

Feel real golf master and golf champion with Real Golf Master 3D. Enjoy realistic golfing experience.
